message.content:
{"id": "18335", "title": "Bug 18335: Perspective contents lost when view is maximized", "description": "When the workbench is closed with a maximized view in a certain perspective, the perspective contents are lost and a temporary layout is persisted instead of the proper layout.", "OB": "The workbench is closed with a maximized view in a certain perspective.", "EB": "The perspective contents are lost and a temporary layout is persisted when the workbench is closed with a maximized view in a certain perspective.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Switch to another perspective
2. Exit the workbench
3. Open the workbench
4. Switch back to the perspective with the maximized view"}
